price: Kò sí ẹnì kan nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ àyàfi kí ó wá bá Àjọkẹ́-ayé ní ipò ẹrúsìn.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
